scripts.front: parcel assets/main.html assets/connexion.html assets/categories.html assets/todo.html --out-dir dev-front-dist
scripts.server: concurrently "npm run devAssetsServer" "npm run devServer" "npm run startServer"
scripts.buildAssetsServer: npm run clearAssets && parcel build assets/main.html assets/connexion.html assets/categories.html assets/todo.html --no-source-maps
scripts.buildServer: npm run clearServer && npm run devServer
scripts.build: npm run buildAssetsServer && npm run buildServer
